welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Brislington, UK! Known for its quaint charm, rich history, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Bristol Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yeovilton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Yeovilton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
